product_name: C.A.M.P. Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set - 10cm Polished - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Take on tough sport routes with the polished C.A.M.P. USA Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set. It's lightweight and has 2 polished Orbit key lock carabiners with great clipping action. Features a bent Orbit carabiner on the rope end of the quickdraw to enable quick clipping of the rope. Includes a straight Orbit carabiner on the bolt end of the quickdraw. Both carabiners have key lock noses that won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making them simple to clip. Smooth gate action offers just the right amount of resistance when clipping. 10cm-long nylon sling connects the 'biners and keeps overall weight low; each C.A.M.P. USA Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set weighs 94g. Webbing color may vary; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated. Overstock.
short_description: Take on tough sport routes with the polished C.A.M.P. USA Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set. It's lightweight and has 2 polished Orbit key lock carabiners with great clipping action.
